name: Pig
description: Pigs are pink and like to roll in the mud. Pigs are often found on farms. Pigs produce pork.

name: Cow
description: A cow is white with black spots. You will usually find a cow on a farm. They produce milk.

name: Chicken
description: A Chicken is a small bird with a red beak. You can find chickens in large groups on a farm. Chickens lay eggs.

name: Sheep
description: A Sheep is a fluffy animal. You can find sheeps on a farm within a large patch of grass behind a fence. Sheeps produce wool.

name: Alpaca
description: Alpacas are quite similar to llamas but smaller. Alpacas are fluffy. Alpacas produce fibers we use in all sorts of clothing.

name: Duck
description: Ducks are small birds with a yellow beak. Ducks can be found near parks and ponds. Ducks lay eggs

name: Fox
description: Foxes are orange with a white underbelly. They are wild animals that roam the woods. No one knows what the fox says.

name: Goat
description: Goats have horns and look like sheep but less fluffy. Goats like to eat grass. Goats produce goat milk.

name: Horse
description: Horses are big animals and come in many different colors. Horses can run fast so people like to ride them.

name: Rabbit
description: Rabbits are small creatures that are very agile. Rabbits come in many different colors.

name: Rooster
description: Roosters are red birds. Roosters are the farmer's alarm clock in the morning.

name: Turkey
description: Turkeys are big birds with a lot of feathers. Turkeys can be found both on farms and also in the wild. Turkeys produce turkey.
